thing-type.label: PJLink Device
thing-type.description: A PJLink compatible device, e.g. a digital projector

parameter-group.name: refresh
parameter-group.label: Polling Settings
parameter-group.description: Use these settings to configure how the status of the PJLink device will be refreshed

parameter.name: ipAddress
parameter.label: IP Address
parameter.description: The address of the PJLink device to control.

parameter.name: tcpPort
parameter.label: TCP Port
parameter.description: The TCP port of the PJLink device to control.

parameter.name: adminPassword
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The password of the PJLink device.

parameter.name: autoReconnectInterval
parameter.label: Auto Reconnect Interval
parameter.description: Seconds between connection retries when connection to the PJLink device has been lost, 0 means never retry, minimum 30s

parameter.name: refreshInterval
parameter.label: Refresh Interval (s)
parameter.description: How often to poll the device state (in seconds). A value of zero will disable polling.

parameter.name: refreshPower
parameter.label: Poll for Power State
parameter.description: Enable polling for the power state. Only considered if the refreshInterval interval is greater than zero.

parameter.name: refreshMute
parameter.label: Poll for Mute State
parameter.description: Enable polling for the mute state. Only considered if the refreshInterval interval is greater than zero.

parameter.name: refreshInputChannel
parameter.label: Poll for Selected Input Channel
parameter.description: Enable polling for the selected input channel. Only considered if the refreshInterval interval is greater than zero.

parameter.name: refreshLampState
parameter.label: Poll for Lamp State
parameter.description: Enable polling for the lamp state. Only considered if the refresh interval is greater than zero.

channel-type.label: Input
channel-type.description: Select the input signal to use

channel-type.label: Audio and Video Mute
channel-type.description: Select the audio and video mute status

channel-type.label: Lamp Hours
channel-type.description: How long the lamp has been in use (in hours)

parameter.name: lampNumber
parameter.label: Lamp Number
parameter.description: Show used hours for this lamp
